title: Democrats lay out ICE demands
shortDescription: Democrats are refusing to vote on any legislation that funds ICE after the killings of Alex Pretti and Renee Good in Minneapolis.

title: 'You can't have guns.' What else has Trump said about the 2nd Amendment?
shortDescription: President Donald Trump has crticized Alex Pretti, killed at a Minneapolis protest, for bringing a gun. He has campaigned on 2nd Amendment rights.

title: How Trump is using his 'king-like' power of clemency a 2nd time around
shortDescription: Clemency gives the president the power to pardon or commute sentences. How has Donald Trump used his power in his first year back? What we know.

title: Ilhan Omar says Trump has 'dementia', is 'obsessed' with her
shortDescription: The Minnesota Democrat’s comments come in the wake of an attack on her Jan. 27 where a man sprayed her with an unknown substance.

title: FBI raids election facility in GA. 'Sore loser's crusade,' Ossoff says
shortDescription: Members of the FBI raided an elections facility in Fulton County, Georgia Wednesday in a search for 2020 presidential election records. What we know.

title: New estimate puts price tag on Trump's troop deployments
shortDescription: If continued through the end of 2026, President Donald Trump's National Guard deployments will cost more than $1.1 billion, a budget estimate found.

title: Dems have 3 demands to address Pretti's killing as shutdown looms
shortDescription: Senate Democrats have coalesced around three main demands for Department of Homeland Security reform as another government shutdown looms.

title: Woman arrested for allegedly planning Trump assassination, police say
shortDescription: Morgan Leigh Morrow was arrested for allegedly recruiting social media users to assassinate President Donald Trump, a West Virginia sheriff says.

title: Fed holds rates steady amid Trump pressure
shortDescription: The Federal Reserve held interest rates steady after a string of late-2025 cuts.

title: Nicki Minaj, exiled by rap, becomes Trump's 'No. 1 fan'
shortDescription: Exiled by rap in recent years, Nicki Minaj has moved further away from the genre that made her famous and closer to Donald Trump.

title: See Trump, Nicki Minaj hold hands at DC summit
shortDescription: Nicki Minaj has become one of Hollywood's most outspoken Trump supporters. See her join him on stage during the Treasury’s Trump Accounts Summit.

title: See Marco Rubio face Senate questions following US capture of Maduro
shortDescription: Secretary of State Marco Rubio testifies for the first time since the U.S. capture of Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro.

title: FBI searches Georgia election center over 2020 vote
shortDescription: The FBI searched the Fulton County Elections Hub & Operations Center near Atlanta as part of a probe linked to the 2020 presidential vote.

title: Second-term curse? Watch Trump's troubles on Greenland, immigration
shortDescription: Presidents have found second terms worse than their first. Even the oft-unprecedented Trump may not be immune.
